FROMRLA(6D)                                         FROMRLA(6D)





NAME
       fromrla - converts a Wavefront image to an IRIS image

SYNOPSIS
       fromrla inimage.rla outimage.rgb

DESCRIPTION
       fromrla converts a Wavefront .rla image file into an rgb
       IRIS image file.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               FROMRLA(6D)
